abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 94         INTRODUCED BY:  ALDERMAN CRAIG SCHMID  An ordinance pertaining to enforcement of code violations relating to the health and safety (ie. environmental sanitation issues, animals, nuisances, hazardous materials, air pollution, businesses, buildings and premises) and enforced by the Department of Health in the City of St. Louis; establishing an administrative procedure under the provisions of Section 479.011 RSMo (2009) to enforce compliance with the provisions of the regulatory codes relating to health and safety; containing a penalty clause and an effective date. To be codified within Chapter Eleven of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis.
